Content:: Bandula Lal Bandarigoda is a Sri Lankan politician. He is a current member of the parliament of Sri Lanka for Galle District.[1][2] Bandarigoda is member of the United National Party and he previously served as a member of the Southern Provincial Council, before electing to the parliament.[3][4] He had his education at Nagoda Royal National College.  This article about a politician from Southern Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
